short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Buttons for Github action based buttons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension

Create Buttons for Github pipeline trigger based comments.

This extension automates the task of commenting the pipeline trigger text into the comment area of GitHub pull request pages saving time for developers and project stakeholders.
Users have the flexibility to customize the format and content of the pipeline trigger comment according to their project requirements. 
Eliminating the need for manual commenting of pipeline trigger text saves valuable time for developers and project managers, allowing them to focus on coding and reviewing pull requests without interruptions.
The extension features an intuitive user interface, making it easy for users to configure settings, track pipeline triggers, and manage comments within GitHub pull requests.

Whether you're a developer working on multiple pull requests or a project manager overseeing a team of contributors, the Pipeline Trigger Comment Chrome Extension is a valuable addition to your workflow, enhancing efficiency, communication, and collaboration within your GitHub projects. Streamline your PR pipeline management today with this essential tool.
